name: part_000
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】かなたそとっ♡神曲アニソンFes!! ⧸ Amane Kanata AnimeSong 3DLIVE 【#天音かなた爆誕2024 ⧸ ホロライブ】 [lVQlIvUr5Dc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening introduction sequence featuring a guest showcase and a countdown from 10 to 1.
Title card display for "Kanataso to! Kamikyoku Anison Fes!!" followed by a transition.
Amane Kanata performs the song "Over Soul" on a 3D stage with water effects and dynamic lighting.

subtitles.original: よみがえれ
subtitles.english: Revive

subtitles.original: 天音かなた2024生誕祭ライブ、いくぞー！
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata 2024 Birthday Live, let's go!

subtitles.original: 空と大地が交差している
subtitles.english: The sky and the earth are intersecting

subtitles.original: 今たたずんでるこの世界で
subtitles.english: In this world I'm standing in right now

subtitles.original: 命が生まれ　また沈んでく
subtitles.english: Life is born and then sinks away again

subtitles.original: 繰り返される営みの中
subtitles.english: In the midst of repeated activities

subtitles.original: こんなもんかとよぎった瞬間
subtitles.english: The moment I thought, "Is this all there is?"

subtitles.original: 夢は力をなくす
subtitles.english: Dreams lose their power

subtitles.original: もう一度生まれよ　この場所で
subtitles.english: Be born once again in this place

subtitles.original: 正義のその奥で夢が息づいてる
subtitles.english: Deep within justice, a dream is breathing

subtitles.original: 重なる力を信じて
subtitles.english: Believe in the overlapping power

subtitles.original: 正義のその奥に闇が潜んでいる
subtitles.english: Deep within justice, darkness is lurking

subtitles.original: 見極めろすべてを
subtitles.english: See through it all

subtitles.original: 振り上げた勇気は切り裂くためじゃない
subtitles.english: The courage you've brandished isn't meant for tearing apart

subtitles.original: 引き合う絆で
subtitles.english: With the bonds that pull us together

subtitles.original: 呼び覚ませ
subtitles.english: Awaken it

subtitles.original: 鮮やかに
subtitles.english: Vividly

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 傷ついて行き場をなくし
subtitles.english: Wounded and with nowhere to go

subtitles.original: さまよっているその魂を
subtitles.english: That soul which is wandering

subtitles.original: 癒やす力は心の奥で
subtitles.english: The power to heal is deep within the heart

subtitles.original: 静かに鼓動を刻んでいる
subtitles.english: Quietly keeping a pulse

subtitles.original: 持てる力すべてぶつけ
subtitles.english: Hit it with all the power you have

subtitles.original: 涙を流すのなら
subtitles.english: If you're going to shed tears

subtitles.original: 選ぶべき道は君を待ってる
subtitles.english: The path you should choose is waiting for you

subtitles.original: 失った今と通り過ぎた過去
subtitles.english: The lost present and the past that has gone by

subtitles.original: 狭間であきらめるよりも
subtitles.english: Rather than giving up in the gap between them

subtitles.original: 今日を目をそらさずにここから始めよう
subtitles.english: Let's not look away from today and start from here

subtitles.original: 見極めろ明日を
subtitles.english: See through to tomorrow

subtitles.original: 誰かに見せつける勇気は脱ぎ捨てて
subtitles.english: Discard the courage that's just for show

subtitles.original: 素顔に戻ろう
subtitles.english: Let's return to our true faces

subtitles.original: 呼び覚ませ
subtitles.english: Awaken it

subtitles.original: 鮮やかに
subtitles.english: Vividly

subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
